title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct research on brain states classification and identify potential use cases. Gather input from subject matter experts and stakeholders.

title: System Architecture Design for BrainStatesClassifier Project
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. Utilize Transfer Learning for faster training and other state-of-the-art machine learning techniques such as Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) and Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN). Outline each step of the data processing pipeline with specific algorithms or libraries to be used, such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, NumPy, and Pandas. Propose a scalable cloud-based database solution like AWS RDS or Azure SQL Database for data storage, considering data sharding and backup strategies. Provide wireframes/mockups for the user interfaces with interactive features, ensuring they are intuitive and user-friendly. Define APIs (including RESTful APIs) with clear endpoints and data exchange formats (e.g., JSON, XML). Outline a microservices architecture where applicable, taking into account service discovery mechanisms like DNS or service registries like Consul. Ensure the design addresses scalability, maintainability, performance requirements, security (HIPAA compliance for handling medical data, secure storage of sensitive data, encrypted communication), and compliance with relevant regulations such as GDPR. Outline the deployment strategy (e.g., containerization with Docker and Kubernetes, CI/CD pipeline) and infrastructure requirements (public cloud or hybrid cloud model). Address edge cases, error handling, and performance optimizations throughout the system architecture design. Consider incorporating AI explainability techniques like SHAP to improve trust in the system's predictions and provide interpretable results.

title: Data Acquisition and Preprocessing
description: Identify and acquire relevant brain data sources (e.g., EEG, fMRI) for training and testing the AI model. Develop data preprocessing and cleaning pipelines.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train the AI model for brain state classification using appropriate machine learning algorithms and techniques.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the system, including visualization of brain state classifications and user interactions.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing brain data, AI model parameters, and classification results.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components of the system and perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security and privacy regulations, such as GDPR and HIPAA. Implement appropriate security measures and data protection mechanisms.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the system to a production environment and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms for performance and error tracking.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the system, including user manuals, technical documentation, and training materials.
